# Prob & Stats

## Distributions

: (\#tab:dist) Common Distributions

| Type      | name                   | Description             | Repr                     | Formula                                                                                                                                                | \(\mu\)           | \(\sigma^2\)                                 | MLE                       |
| --------- | ---------------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| Discrete  | Geometric              | First Occur Times       | \(G(X)\)                 | \(p(x=k) = (1-p)^{k-1}p\)                                                                                                                              | \(\frac{1}{p}\)   | \(\frac{1-p}{p^2}\)                          |                           |
| Discrete  | Binomial               | Replacement Sampling    | \(B(n, p)\)              | \(p(x=k)=\binom{n}{k}p^{k}(1-p)^{n-k}\)                                                                                                                | \(np\)            | \(np(1-p)\)                                  | \(\hat{p} = \frac{x}{n}\) |
| Discrete  | Hypergeometric         | No Replacement Sampling | \(H(n, p)\)              | \(p(x=k)=\frac{\binom{M}{k}\binom{N-M}{n-k}}{\binom{N}{N}}\)                                                                                           | \(n\frac{M}{N}\)  | \(\frac{N-n}{N-1}n\frac{M}{N}\frac{N-M}{N}\) |                           |
| Discrete  | Poisson                | Occur Times             | \(P(\lambda)\)           | \(p(x=k)=\frac{\lambda^{k}e^{-\lambda}}{k!}\)                                                                                                          | \(\lambda \)      | \(\lambda\)                                  |                           |
| Continual | Uniform                | ---                     | \(U(a, b)\)              | \(f(x) = \begin{cases}\frac{1}{b-a} &\quad (a\le x\le b) \\ 0 &\quad (otherwise)\end{cases}\)                                                          | \(\frac{a+b}{2}\) | \(\frac{(b-a)^2}{12}\)                       |                           |
| Continual | Normal                 | ---                     | \(N(\mu, \sigma^{2})\)   | \(f(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}\sigma^{2}}e^{-\frac{1}{2}(\frac{x-\mu}{\sigma})^2}\)                                                                     | \(\mu\)           | \(\sigma^{2}\)                               |                           |
| Continual | Chi Square             | ---                     | \(\chi_{n}^{2}\)         | \(\chi_{n}^{2} = \sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}X_{i}^{2} \\ X_i \sim N(0,1)\)                                                                                   | \(n\)             | \(2n\)                                       |                           |
| Continual | Non-Central Chi Square | ---                     | \(\chi_{n,\lambda}^{2}\) | \(\chi_{n, \lambda}^{2} = \sum\limits_{i=1}^{n}X_{i}^{2} \\ X_i \sim N(\mu_{i},1) \\ \lambda=\sum\mu_{i}^2\)                                           | \(n + \lambda\)   | \(2n + 4\lambda\)                            |                           |
| Continual | T                      | ---                     | \(t_{n}\)                | \(t_{n}=\frac{X}{\sqrt{\frac{\chi_{n}^2}{n}}} \quad X\sim N(0,1)\)                                                                                     |                   |                                              |                           |
| Continual | Non-Central T          | ---                     | \(t_{n, \delta}\)        | \(t_{n, \delta}=\frac{Z + \delta}{\sqrt{\frac{\chi_{n}^2}{n}}} \\ P(t_{n, \delta_1} \le X) \ge P(t_{n, \delta_2} \le X) \quad \delta_1 \le \delta_2 \) |                   |                                              |                           |
| Continual | F                      | ---                     | \(F_{n,m}\)              | \(F_{n, m} = \frac{{\chi_n/n}}{\chi_m/m} \\ F_{1, n} = t_{n}^{2}\)                                                                                     |                   |                                              |                           |
